name: Ashanti's Quest
description:
This is an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

It is a lite RPG where the battles are out of your control. You must prepare your party's loadout ahead of time to increase their odds of success.

Due to the time restraint, the game is not completely polished or balanced, but it can be beaten.

Please enjoy.
